title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.9 - Contents of statement of appeal
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 113.9 - Contents of statement of appeal

State Regulations

The statement of appeal shall contain a clear and concise
narrative statement of the appellant's claim, including a statement of the
relief to which the appellant deems himself entitled. The appellant may attach
to his statement of appeal such supporting affidavits, memoranda or other
papers as he considers pertinent to his appeal. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
113.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
